name: Barbell Biceps Curl
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding barbell with underhand grip.
Keep elbows close to your sides.
Curl the weight toward your shoulders, contracting biceps.
Lower slowly to starting position.
Repeat for 8-12 reps.

name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on a bench with feet on the floor.
Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder width.
Lower the bar slowly to your chest.
Push it back up until your arms are fully extended.
Repeat for 8-12 reps.

name: Chest Fly Machine
instructions: Sit with back flat against the pad.
Grab handles with elbows slightly bent.
Bring arms together in front of chest, squeezing pecs.
Slowly return to starting position.
Repeat for 10-15 reps.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bar over mid-foot.
Bend at hips and knees to grip the bar.
Keep back flat, chest up, and core tight.
Drive through heels to stand up, pulling bar along legs.
Lower bar with control and repeat for 5-8 reps.

name: Decline Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a decline bench with feet secured.
Grip barbell slightly wider than shoulder width.
Lower bar to lower chest area.
Press upward until arms are fully extended.
Repeat for 8-12 reps.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms facing inward.
Keep elbows close to torso.
Curl weights up toward shoulders.
Lower slowly to starting position.
Repeat for 10-15 reps.

name: Hip Thrust
instructions: Sit on ground with upper back against bench.
Place barbell across hips (use padding).
Drive through heels to lift hips up.
Squeeze glutes at top, forming straight line from knees to shoulders.
Lower and repeat for 10-15 reps.

name: Incline Bench Press
instructions: Lie on an incline bench (30-45Â°).
Grip barbell slightly wider than shoulder width.
Lower bar to upper chest.
Press upward until arms are extended.
Repeat for 8-12 reps.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit and grasp the bar wider than shoulder width.
Pull bar down to your upper chest.
Squeeze your lats and slowly release.
Keep torso stationary throughout movement.
Repeat for 10-15 reps.

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at your sides.
Keep slight bend in elbows.
Raise arms to shoulder height, leading with elbows.
Lower slowly back to start.
Repeat for 12-15 reps.

name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit with back against pad, ankles under roller.
Extend legs until fully straight.
Squeeze quadriceps at top.
Lower slowly to starting position.
Repeat for 12-15 reps.

name: Leg Raises
instructions: Lie on back with legs straight.
Keep lower back pressed to floor.
Raise legs until perpendicular to ground.
Lower slowly without touching floor.
Repeat for 12-20 reps.

name: Plank
instructions: Start in push-up position on forearms.
Keep body in straight line from head to heels.
Engage core and squeeze glutes.
Hold for 30-60 seconds.
Breathe steadily throughout.

name: Pull Up
instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Pull yourself up until chin is over bar.
Squeeze shoulder blades together at top.
Lower yourself with control.
Repeat for 5-12 reps.

name: Push-up
instructions: Start in plank position with hands shoulder-width apart.
Lower body until chest nearly touches floor.
Keep elbows at 45-degree angle.
Push back up to starting position.
Repeat for 10-20 reps.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand holding barbell at hip level.
Keep knees slightly bent and back straight.
Lower bar by pushing hips back.
Feel stretch in hamstrings, bar stays close to legs.
Return to start and repeat for 8-12 reps.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit with knees bent, feet off floor.
Lean back slightly, holding weight at chest.
Rotate torso to touch weight beside hip.
Twist to other side.
Repeat for 20-30 total reps (10-15 per side).

name: Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height.
Press weights overhead until arms are extended.
Keep core tight and avoid arching back.
Lower slowly back to shoulders.
Repeat for 8-12 reps.

name: Squat
instructions: Position barbell on upper traps.
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower your hips until thighs are parallel to floor.
Keep chest up and knees tracking over toes.
Push through heels to return to start.

name: T-Bar Row
instructions: Straddle the bar with bent knees and flat back.
Grip handles with both hands.
Pull bar toward chest, squeezing shoulder blades.
Lower under control.
Repeat for 8-12 reps.

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Grip bars or bench edge, arms extended.
Lower body by bending elbows to 90 degrees.
Keep elbows close to body.
Push back up to starting position.
Repeat for 8-15 reps.

name: Tricep Pushdown
instructions: Stand facing cable machine, grip bar with palms down.
Keep elbows at sides.
Push down until arms are straight.
Squeeze triceps at bottom.
Slowly return to start and repeat for 10-15 reps.
